bill_title: to establish certain fish possession limits.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain fish possession limits. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The possession limit for any species of fish taken from the inland waters of the state is five times the daily catch limit established for the species in rules promulgated pursuant to § 41-2-18. This section does not apply to possession limits established for boundary waters or special management waters. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
